mapper.select: select id, username, password, roles, authorities, ip, domain, enabled, first_login, create_time, update_time from jwt_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into jwt_user(username, password, roles, authorities, ip, domain, enabled, first_login, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{roles}, #{authorities}, #{ip}, #{domain}, #{enabled}, #{firstLogin}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into jwt_user(username, password, roles, authorities, ip, domain, enabled, first_login, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.roles}, #{entity.authorities}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.domain}, #{entity.enabled}, #{entity.firstLogin}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into jwt_user(username, password, roles, authorities, ip, domain, enabled, first_login, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.roles}, #{entity.authorities}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.domain}, #{entity.enabled}, #{entity.firstLogin}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), password = values(password), roles = values(roles), authorities = values(authorities), ip = values(ip), domain = values(domain), enabled = values(enabled), first_login = values(first_login), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update jwt_user
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
roles = #{roles},
authorities = #{authorities},
ip = #{ip},
domain = #{domain},
enabled = #{enabled},
first_login = #{firstLogin},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
